t: Amazon Pay vs Stripe | What are the differences?
s: Amazon Pay charges a flat fee for every transaction, with different rates for domestic and cross-border payments. Stripe, on the other hand, provides more flexibility in its pricing structure, offering volume discounts and customizable pricing plans for businesses with larger transaction volumes. This makes Stripe more suitable for businesses that anticipate significant payment volume or seek more cost-effective options. Brand ...
